subject: Dear Sir ,
body:
Dear Sir ,
My name is Mr Steven James I am Financial Consultant, my client have
interest in Investing in your country into a Joint /venture partnership
Kindly contact me if you are interested .
I await your response
Regards,
Mr Steven James

subject: Re:   Dear Sir ,
body:
Dear Mr. Steven James,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm interested in learning more about the investment opportunity you mentioned. Could you please provide me with some additional details? Specifically, I would like to know what type of joint venture your client is looking to invest in and what industry it is related to.

Additionally, it would be helpful if you could share some information about your client's background and their previous experience with investments. This will help me assess the potential benefits and risks associated with this opportunity.

I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Sheldon

subject: Re: Dear Sir ,
body:
Attention Mr Sheldon

My client is interested in investing $1.5BILLION (ONE BILLION FIVE
HUNDRED MILLION UNITED STATES DOLLARS) .He solicit for an
investor who has the capacity to invest .


Interested areas :

Textiles, Information technology,Pharmaceuticals, Oil & Energy
Industries, Mining & Metals Industry,Management Consulting Industry,
Maritime industry, Hospital & Health Care Industry, Consumer Services
Industry, International Trade and Development Industry, Gambling &
Casinos Industry,Electrical/Electronic Manufacturing Industry,
Insurance Industry,Chemical industries, Marketing and Advertising

Industry,Leisure,Travel & Tourism Industry, Agriculture, Aviation,
Retail,Import and Export, Trade and development industry, Real Estate
& Construction Industry and any other viable profitable investment
opportunities in your region are welcomed.

I decided to contact you to know if you would like to share details
about the projects you have at the moment that require funding.

My investor is interested in projects and willing to invest into your
projects if any.

To proceed, please provide us with a workable business/project Plan
for our study.

Introduce the following :

(a)Introduction and description of your company or your personal details.
(b)Your Full name,your Home/Office address,your phone/mobile numbers
(c)The type of business that you are running and sector of activities.
(d)Investment of concern. Please Specify the sector of investment of
your interest: (indicate if you have more than 1 choice in mind).

I would appreciate your reply with more details on this and other
projects you might have at the moment.

We will review and get back with the details of the completion.

We will rely on your professional ideas and trust to work with you.i will
tell you more about the investor,then we discuss the sharing ratio.

Await your urgent return mail.

Mr Steven James
a consultant  to Mr Rafael Savimbi Jnr.

subject: Re: Dear Sir ,
body:
Hello Mr. Steven James,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this investment opportunity. I appreciate your interest in my projects and potential funding. However, before proceeding further, I would like to gather some more information.

Could you please provide me with more details about the investor who is interested in investing? It would be helpful to know their background and experience in the investment industry.

Additionally, could you clarify what specific types of projects or industries they are most interested in? You mentioned a few sectors such as textiles, oil energy, mining metals, etc., but it would be great to have a clearer understanding of their preferences.

Furthermore, I would like to know more about the sharing ratio you mentioned. Could you explain how that works and what it entails?

Once I have these details, I will be able to provide you with a comprehensive business project plan for your study.

Looking forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Sheldon

subject: Re: Dear Sir ,
body:
Attention Mr Sheldon

Thanks  for your mail received this morning.The investor name is Mr RAFAEL
SAVIMBI JR.he is from Angola republic and also a former leader.During his
tenure,he awarded a contract to two  business oil mugol from the kingdom of
saudi arabia and a brunei business man.although there was an over invoice
and gratification that made up this investment funds $1.5BILLION.

However,as I send this mail,Mr Rafael Savimbi Jr,is politically exposed,and
does want any one to know he is involved in this project,that is the reason
he will want you to have full and sole control of this investment for the
period of TEN 10years.

As you can see,Mr RAFAEL SAVIMBI JR,just mentioned all these projects or
industries,but it all depends on you to know and choose areas that will be
profitable where you can invest the funds judiciously and make profit.You
can invest these funds in any business of your choice.

The sharing ratio is as follows.
65% of the total is for the investor Mr RAFAEL SAVIMBI JR
34% of the total amount is for MR SHELDON AND GROUP
1% will be set aside to defray any expenses that we might in incure in the
process of payment,and shall be reimbursed back as soon as the funds gets
into your custody.it will be captured in the Mou/agreement which i will
send to you soonest which will be legalized in your present before
proceeding to the Absa bank for payment face to face in your present also.

Lastly, I would like to have all your details,to enable me to send you
Mou/agreement to let you know where the funds were deposited.

If there are any more questions,please feel free to ask.

Please for further correspondences to this email address   (
official1779012@gmail.com)


Await your urgent return mail.

Mr Steven James
a consultant  to Mr Rafael Savimbi Jnr.

subject: Re: Dear Sir ,
body:
Dear Mr. Steven James,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing this information about Mr. Rafael Savimbi Jr. It sounds like he has an interesting investment opportunity. I would like to learn more about the projects he mentioned and how I can potentially be involved.

Could you please provide some additional details about the specific businesses or industries that Mr. Savimbi is looking to invest in? Also, what is the estimated timeframe for this investment?

I appreciate your assistance in sending me the Mou agreement so that I can review it and understand where the funds have been deposited. Additionally, could you clarify how the expenses will be reimbursed once the funds are transferred?

Thank you again for your email, and I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Sheldon
